long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CoGo Virtual Drive is a virtual disc delivery system to allow remote preview of Blu-Ray and DVD discs.  The Chrome extension enables communication with the native host that is installed as part of the CoGo Virtual Drive software.  Disc images can be loaded into the CoGo DVD-ROM/BD-ROM virtual drive and previewed as if the disc is present on the local machine.
